title: 311: Michelle’s Cast Bio Breakdown (Part 1)
itunes:title: 311: Michelle’s Cast Bio Breakdown (Part 1)
description:
(YOU CAN JOIN US ON OUR YOUTUBE CHANNEL TO FOLLOW ALONG VISUALLY!) The Broads and Bro have united to break down the first half of Michelle’s cast! Join them as they make wild assumptions and predictions about these men! Will Bekah’s psychic face reading abilities pull through? Only time will tell! And be sure to join The Broads and Bros again tomorrow (Friday) for part 2!

 

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SQUARESPACE: Go to Squarespace.com/chatty for a free trial and when you’re ready to launch, use the offer code Chatty to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain!

***FEALS: go to FEALS.COM/CHATTY and you’ll get 40% off your first three months with free shipping!

***MEJURI: Head to MEJURI.COM/CHATTY for 10% off your first order!

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY125 and use code CHATTY125 to get $125 off including free shipping!

 ***FABLE HOME: Head to FABLEHOME.CO and use the code CHATTY to take 10% off your first purchase!

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
